Name: Hide and Seek
About the game: This game has two teams. One team is 'Seekers' and the other one is 'Hiders'. The seekers' task is to beat they hiders with apples as soon as possible. The hiders in turn can transform into different object on the map. Their main task is to stay hidden.
Meta Title: Hide and Seek: Feb 1, 2019, Funny Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hide and Seek? Check out the release date (Feb 1, 2019), developer insights from Funny Games, and a complete game summary.
